PatientDetails.Name: Joanna Sprague
HospitalCourse: Admitted on 09/19/2024 for NSTEMI complicated by cardiogenic shock.
Underwent percutaneous coronary intervention and Impella insertion.
Re-intubated for airway protection due to poor secretion management.
Continued to experience complications including leukocytosis and fever, being closely monitored.

Medications: Dual antiplatelet therapy with Aspirin and Ticagrelor

Sepsis.ClinicalNotes: Leukocytosis raised concerns for infection; awaiting further lab results.

BloodProducts.TransfusionEvents: One unit of packed cells administered to maintain hemoglobin >8.
